name: SpaceShoota
description:
Controls:
WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement
Hold Space to shoot

You play as "Ace" a Space Fighter Pilot in some Space Force (In Space?).

Space Shoota is a Vertical SHMUP (Shoot 'em Up).

Developed for the "VimJam: Collectables"

"Boldly going somewhere... and Back again..."

What I would have tried to do with more time...

"Collectables" - are Weapon Powerups and Health Kits

"There and Back" - well you go one direction (to there...) and then you turn around and come Back...

Restrictions Followed:
Theme Party - Arcade Controls Jam
In a Song - Well it is beatable within 1 track (i.e. before it loops)

At least 1 more level (with at least 1 more boss)

  • A better animation for when you start returning (rather than teleporting the player to the other side of the screen)
  • Made the Explosions better
  • Playtested more, balanced the levels more.
  • redone the scoring system
Attribution (as mentioned in Credits in game)

Everything not listed here... plus as mentioned some of the Art was done by Me, Myself and I (Fatrobin)
